articles.description: The strikes are part of an ongoing dispute between union members and train company bosses over pay amid the cost-of-living crisis.
articles.content: Members of the RMT union working at Network Rail and 14 train companies have voted for another six months of strikes, meaning more industrial action is likely unless a deal on pay, job security, and … [+3546 chars]
